<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>List Login IP Allow Lists</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/ip_allow_list_login"}></MethodEndpoint>



Returns a list of data objects that contain the CIDRs in the allow list to access the Prisma Cloud tenant.

successful operation
